events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you soon for the initial screening.
We conducted the initial screening call and are pleased with your technical background and communication skills.
Thank you for the update, I am excited to move forward and look forward to the next steps in the hiring process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM. Please confirm your availability.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the interviewers appreciated your problem-solving approach.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 10th at 2 PM. Please prepare for questions related to company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview went well, and the panel was impressed with your alignment to our core values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary and benefits package.
I am happy to accept the offer and excited to join the team. Looking forward to contributing as a software engineer.
Candidate has formally accepted the offer and confirmed start date next month.
Onboarding activities have begun including account setup, orientation, and introduction to the engineering team.
The recruitment process is officially complete and the new engineer has successfully joined our company.
